name: BotulismTestsForClostridiumBotulinumToxin
title: Botulism (Tests for Clostridium botulinum Toxin)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Clostridium botulinum nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Clostridium botulinum toxin 

LOINC Search terms: â€˜Clostridium botulinum -Ab -NAA -(culture or isolate or panel)),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
